import React from 'react' import {Link, useParams, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import Rating from '../Components/Rating' import {detailsProduct} from '../actions/productAction' import Messages from '../Components/Messages' import CheckoutSteps from '../Components/CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) return ( <>

Shipping

Address : {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
